description:
If you love high-seas adventures in the Golden Age of Piracy and RPGs that dig their heels deeper into roleplaying than Dungeons and Dragons, I can't recommend Chaosium's 7th Sea: Second Edition enough - and this Humble Bundle offers a super-cheap way to set sail. You can grab $321 / £247.59 worth of 7th Sea: Second Edition RPG books, expansions, and guides for only $18 / £13.88.

Continue reading Dive into this rules-light, piratical DnD rival with a huge 94% off bundle
MORE FROM WARGAMER:
title: Dive into this rules-light, piratical DnD rival with a huge 94% off bundle
